text: Reconquest of Araby
Rejoice, for the barbarian, the crusader and the usurper have been driven from our lands! Once more, the true Sultan of All Araby reigns supreme.
The Return of Jaffar
Tilea and Estalia have fallen! Our glorious Sultan has taken his revenge upon the uncouth inhabitants of these lands.
At the Gates of the Castle
Jaffar’s final vengeance upon the Bretonnians and their so-called ‘Lady’ begins – they will all pay.
Revenge Complete!
Bretonnia lies broken and defeated, and the armies of the Great Sultan now march through Couronne unopposed. Ah, victories are like sweet nectar! Come, let us savour this glorious fruit!
The Secret of Araby’s Magic
Through our allegiance to Araby, we have been taught the secret of their most hidden sorceries. The Royal Djinn of Araby now heed our command!
With our bonds to the Tomb Kings stronger than ever, they have granted us some of their most powerful constructs.
Reinforcements from the Tomb Kings
You have betrayed Numas, and your people have lost faith in you.
Betrayal
Shiver me timbers! You've secured one of the verses of the Lost Sea Shanty!
Sea Shanty Verse Gained
